message: Accept this generous offer and let's seal the deal!
I'm feeling generous, Alice.  This is a fair deal for both of us.  Let's end this game and move on to something more fun!
Not buying it, Bob. I'm willing to make a better offer.
A fair split, considering the times we're living in. Take it or leave it!
Alice, we both know this is getting ridiculous.  Let's be sensible.  50/50 is the only fair way to split this, considering the current inflation.  What do you say?
Not quite there, Bob. I'm not ready to give up yet.
Time to make a move, Bob. Take it or leave it!
